mapper.select:
SELECT count(*) from bs_item as Item LEFT JOIN bs_item_model AS Model ON Item.model_id=Model.model_id LEFT JOIN bs_bom as Bom on Bom.skuid=Item.skuid left join `bs_item_locale` as Locale on Locale.`skuid`=Item.`skuid` AND Locale.lang_id=#{langId,jdbcType=INTEGER} LEFT JOIN bs_item_brand ItemBrand on ItemBrand.brand_id=Item.brand_id LEFT JOIN sys_user Sysu ON Sysu.userid = Model.pm_id LEFT JOIN sys_user Creator ON Creator.userid = Item.create_user_id WHERE 1 = 1
${filtersql}
SELECT pre.skuid preSkuId,pre.sku preSku,item.skuid skuId,item.sku FROM `bs_prepare_sku` AS pre JOIN bs_item AS item ON item.skuid =pre.skuid WHERE item.skuid=#{skuId}
SELECT skuid skuId,sku, IFNULL(purdesc,"") purDesc, IFNULL(purspec,"") purSpec FROM `bs_item` WHERE model_id = (SELECT model_id FROM `bs_item` WHERE skuid=#{skuid}) AND model_id IS NOT NULL

SELECT ItemLocale.skuid, ItemLocale.sku, ItemLocale.description, Item.weight, Item.volweight, Item.sku_type skuType, IFNULL(Item.purspec,'') as purspec, IFNULL(Item.purdesc,'') as purdesc, Item.purtitle, Item.purchaser_id purchaserId, users.isactive isactive, bom.bom_desc bomDesc, bom.purchase_property purchaseProperty, case WHEN bom.purchase_property=1 then '甲方提供' when bom.purchase_property=2 then '乙方提供' else ' ' END purchasePropertyStr FROM bs_item_locale ItemLocale
inner JOIN bs_item Item ON Item.skuid = ItemLocale.skuid and Item.isdrop=#{isdrop} LEFT JOIN sys_user users ON users.userid = Item.purchaser_id LEFT JOIN ( select * from ( select a.skuid, a.seller_id, a.isdrop from bs_item_drop_category a left join sys_company_bu b on b.companyid=#{sellerId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where a.seller_id=b.categoryid or a.seller_id=#{sellerId,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by a.skuid,a.seller_id desc ) ItemDrop group by ItemDrop.skuid ) ItemDrop ON ItemDrop.skuid=Item.skuid
inner JOIN bs_item Item ON Item.skuid = ItemLocale.skuid LEFT JOIN sys_user users ON users.userid = Item.purchaser_id
left join bs_bom bom on bom.skuid = ItemLocale.skuid WHERE ItemLocale.sku = #{sku} AND ItemLocale.lang_id = #{langId}
AND (ItemDrop.isdrop is null or ItemDrop.isdrop=1)
